section:
Class List Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:Admin
In this class, there are all features and relations between Admins and the other classes Course
In this class, there are all features and relations between Courses and All members in the learning Process Database
This Class has the used database (Professors, Students, Admins and Courses) Dialog
In this class, there are all processes that will be run in case of error occur MainWindow
In this class, there are all processes and actions all over the program Professor
In this class, there are all features and relations between Professors and courses Student
In this class, there are all features and relations between student and courses User
In this class, there are all features and relations between Admins, Students and Professors
